title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

description.narrative: Power distribution systems rehabilitated, augmented and expanded.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
Additional 2,396 MVA of distribution capacity installed by 2018.

description.narrative: Power distribution systems rehabilitated, augmented and expanded.

title.narrative: Transmission and distribution system losses reduced from 20.5% in 2012 to 19.5% in 2018.

description.narrative: Power distribution systems rehabilitated, augmented and expanded.

title.narrative: 274 GWh of energy saved per year starting from 2018 (baseline: 71,368 GWh in 2012).
